Package com.hexanome16.server.services

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.server.services.GameService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameServiceInterface
@Service public class GameService extends Object implements GameServiceInterface
Service is responsible for managing game state requests from the GameController.

    • buyCard

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> buyCard(long sessionId, String cardMd5, String authenticationToken, int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Description copied from interface: GameServiceInterface
      Allows client to buy card, given that they send a valid way to buy that card.
      Specified by:
      buyCard in interface GameServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      sessionId - sessionID.
      cardMd5 - Card we want to purchase's md5.
      authenticationToken - username of the player trying to buy the card.
      rubyAmount - amount of ruby gems proposed.
      emeraldAmount - amount of emerald gems proposed.
      sapphireAmount - amount of sapphire gems proposed.
      diamondAmount - amount of diamond gems proposed.
      onyxAmount - amount of onyx gems proposed.
      goldAmount - amount of gold gems proposed.
      Returns:

      HTTP OK if it's the player's turn and the proposed offer is acceptable, HTTP BAD_REQUEST otherwise.

      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - the json processing exception

    • findPlayerByName

      Description copied from interface: GameServiceInterface

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      game - game where player is supposed to be.
      username - name of player.
